name: Chroma Shift (itch)
description:
Here is my first ever Game Jam project.

This took a fair amount of work as I had to learn Unity 2D and I'm barely knowledgeable in C#

Gameplay:

Platform your way to the other side. You can only interact with platforms that are the same colour as you, so you have to change (as in the theme :D) colours to beat the levels.

Controls:

A & D: Movement

Space Bar: Jump

Left Click: Attach a grapple hook to the selected platform

Right Click: Change colour

There isn't that many levels and the game can be quite buggy. This is more a concept game as I really like this game idea and would like to evolve it to something else in the future.

Please comment on how I did! It's my first ever game really, so I know it isn't that good. But I had a lot of fun making it and would love any feedback.

(I'm aware that the grapple line isn't working for the blue colour. I don't know at this moment how to fix it, nor do I have the time to figure out how so it'll just be a happy accident :P)

Huge shout out to Ethan Ast, who did the music for this project, Flow State. He's a dude I personally know so this was done as a favour. If you want some good music for your game or project, feel free to hit him up for one of his tracks or a custom track at his Instagram (@ethansspace). 

Thanks!
